lead_paragraph: A federal judge has again ruled against Texas in its efforts to stop the resettlement of Syrian refugees.

headline.print_headline: Texas: Judge Again Refuses to Block Refugees
headline.main: Texas: Judge Again Refuses to Block Refugees

snippet: A federal judge has again ruled against Texas in its efforts to stop the resettlement of Syrian refugees.
abstract: Judge David Godbey of District Court in Austin, Tex, rules against Texas for second time, denying lawsuit filed by state Republican leaders against Obama administration to stop resettlement of Syrian refugees; says Texas, one of 30 states vowing to ban refugees following Paris terror attacks, did not provide evidence outlining substantial risk.
